This is a summary of my work during the Lucid cycle, and plans for Lucid+1.

== Lucid ==

* Moderated the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=377|Lucid Lynx Testing and Discussion subforum]]</nowiki> at ubuntuforums.org
** Wrote and maintained documentation on good testing practices for forum participants (Examples: <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1343434|1]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1343449|2]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1433791|3]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1414103|4]]</nowiki>) 
** Did community management and coordination work, mostly helping forum users file good bug reports

== Lucid+1 ==

* Participate in Ayatana, Software Center and GNOME Shell design and discourse
* Work on improving communications between the Canonical UX&D Team, and establishing community processes for UX&D (<nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/lucid-uxd-community-integration/|blueprint]]</nowiki>)
* Continue bug triage and forum work 
* Finally get round to working on the <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/karmic-qa-testing-weather-report|Testing Weather Report]]</nowiki> project
